CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT(My_Repairs__r.destination__c) = "156RASS", "After Sales Center Ontario", IF(TEXT(My_Repairs__r.destination__c) = "156RAS2", "After Sales Center Piscataway", IF(TEXT(My_Repairs__r.destination__c) = "156RAS3", "After Sales Center Legacy 1854", IF(TEXT(My_Repairs__r.destination__c) = "101RASS", "After Sales Center Cergy", IF(TEXT(My_Repairs__r.destination__c) = "F92HUB", "UK Local Repair Center", IF(TEXT(My_Repairs__r.destination__c) = "179RASS", "After Sales Center Shanghai", IF(TEXT(My_Repairs__r.destination__c) = "172RASS", "After Sales Center Singapore", IF(TEXT(My_Repairs__r.destination__c) = "L48HUB", "AU Local Repair Center", IF(TEXT(My_Repairs__r.destination__c) = "186RASS", "After Sales Center Seoul", " " )))))))))
CustomField.label: Location
